main event: The observer reported a series of red glowing lights in a fixed position on the night of June 22, 1968, which were later suggested to be from an aircraft with an electrical advertising sign.
interesting points: The observer initially mistook the lights for an aircraft but noted an unusual number and arrangement of the lights,The lights blinked rhythmically while some remained stationary,The observer's report led to a cross-check with a nearby advertising aircraft,This phenomenon was visible for approximately 15 miles,This sighting prompted further investigation into electrical advertising displays in the area.
witness description: A person who observed the lights from their location.
